entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as yelling between huge pretend sobs and shooting Harry a nasty grin through the gap in his mother’s arms. He is also mentioned as being spoiled by his parents.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving a nasty grin from Dudley through the gap in his mother’s arms.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as being frantic when she hears the doorbell ring and says 'Oh, Good Lord, they’re here!'

entities.name: piers polkiss
entities.description: Piers Polkiss is described as a scrawny boy with a face like a rat. He is also mentioned as being Dudley's best friend.

entities.name: pier's mother
entities.description: Piers' mother is mentioned as walking in with Piers.

relationships.description: Dudley dislikes Harry and tries to spoil everything for him.
Aunt Petunia is a caregiver for Dudley, as she is his mother’s sister.
Piers Polkiss is described as being Dudley's best friend.
